DOC.criteria: Adolescents 12 18 year old Hispanic , African American Caucasian ethnicity Have Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 5th 85th percentile great 95th percentile Must currently attend UC Davis Pediatric clinic Chronic liver kidney disease , know Diabetes chronic illness ( Sickle Cell Disease Cystic Fibrosis ) Subjects NOT acutely febrile , smoke , chronically use prescription medication oral contraceptive pill .
